themes: critique of diversity requirements based on leadership/staff composition
focus on audiences and community served
key_phrases: Make the funding criteria about art and community-building NOT about generating tourism revenue
not the forced diversity criteria that prioritizes ethnic composition of leadership and staff
barriers_identified: funding criteria focused on tourism revenue
diversity criteria prioritizing ethnic composition of leadership and staff
solutions_proposed: Make the funding criteria about art and community-building
Prioritize audiences and community served instead of diversity criteria based on leadership/staff composition
